short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It fill your screen one color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It fill your screen one color.

For example, if you want to take a picture in front of one color, you just set your display bright and kick the "Fill Screen" with needed color.
